channel.title: Local Obituaries from WVVA.com and Tributes.com
channel.description: Obituaries and Online Obituaries News at Tributes.com. Find Local and National Obituaries News and Personal Tributes. Read Obituaries, Death and Funeral Notices, and Create Obituaries for Loved Ones.

item.title: Naomi June Raines, 82, Princeton, West Virginia
item.description:
Naomi was born on March 26, 1937 and passed away on Thursday, September 26, 2019.
Naomi was a resident of Princeton, West Virginia at the time of passing.
Naomi was a graduate of Bluefield State College earning a degree in Education and worked as a teacher in the Mercer County school system.
A funeral service to celebrate the life of Naomi will take place at 4:00 p.m. Sunday, September 29, 2019 at Seaver Funeral Home in Princeton with Reverend Tom McDowell officiating.
item.author: Tributes.com

item.description:

item.title: Joe Hill, 91, Mullens, West Virginia
item.description:
Joe was born on September 15, 1927 and passed away on Saturday, September 14, 2019.
Joe was a resident of Mullens, West Virginia at the time of passing.
He attended barber school in Cincinnati, Ohio and had been a barber in Mullens since 1949.
He was a U. S. Army Veteran having served during the Korean Conflict and in his leisure, he was an avid WVU fan, golfer, and loved spending time with his family.
